column5: Heading up next week and have been searching the net for ice/water conditions.  Would be interesting to see any pics from all the local lakes (Scugog/Pigeon/Rice) etc.  Chomping at the bit...   Is there a site that hosts this information? Water level information is great but "Pictures are worth..."  Thanks.

You won't find any ice on those lakes you mentioned...  http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/modis.php?region=o&page=2&template=sub&image=a1.13111.1829.LakeOntario.143.250m.jpg  Just be careful of floating debris!

Cliff is right on...lots of docks floated off their moorings from the high water in Pigeon Lake...  Sorry, no recent pics of the lake but I drove past Emily Creek this morning on my way down # 36  to Lindsay and the creek looked like a lake...
